H0.text: Where has Baroness Royall of Blaisdon led the opposition since May 2010. House of Lords

H1.text: Where has Baroness Royall of Blaisdon led the opposition since May 2010. European Parliament

H2.text: Where has Baroness Royall of Blaisdon led the opposition since May 2010. Labour Party Conference

H3.text: Where has Baroness Royall of Blaisdon led the opposition since May 2010. UKHL

A4.text: She announced in May 2015 that she would not seek re-election as the Leader of the Opposition in the House of Lords.

A5.text: She was appointed government chief whip in the House of Lords on 24 January 2008.
